channel.title: Cant log in on my server! HELP
channel.description:
so there is a problem constantly happening on my server. My account (owner of the server...) dont log in after about an hour of game play. nothing is wrong with password b/c it logs in and shows the "Loading - Please Wait" black screen. Everyone else is fine and can log in. I tried different internet connection and still dont work. [u]EDIT: i also used different computers..[/u] Im using TestScape. and all i can do is delete the account files and recreate the account =[ and it starts all over. Its like when i delete my account the next account that was created goes thru same thing =S.
:( IDK wat to do..
and how do i access the .dat character files in TestScape (wat program can read them?)
Thanks in advance for any help..

item.title: Cant log in on my server! HELP
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

make sure u dont have a item id over 19000 in ur invent on ur char file

Read full topic
